officialTitle: A Randomized, Multicenter, Two Arm, Open Label, Twelve Week Phase IIIb Study to Evaluate the Tolerability of Rebif (New Formulation) (IFN Beta-1a) and Betaseron (IFN Beta-1b) in IFN-naive Subjects With Relapsing Remitting Multiple Sclerosis (RRMS) Followed by a Single Arm, Eighty-two Week Minimum, Rebif (New Formulation) Only Safety Extension

interventions.name: New Formulation of rebif - human interferon beta-1a

summary: To evaluate the tolerability of a new formulation of rebif and Betaseron in subjects with relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis (RRMS) by comparing the mean change in injection site pain scores from pre-injection to 30 minutes post therapy administration.

primaryOutcome.measure: Visual Analog Scale (VAS) of Patient Reported Pain: Change in Mean VAS for the 21 Full-dose Injections at Pre-injection and 30 Minutes Post-injection Timepoints
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From pre-injection to 30 minutes post injection of the VAS pain scores across the first 21 injections of full dose therapy of a new formulation of rebif and Betaseron

commonTop: General Disorders and Administration site condition
